original_text: Partly, whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions; and partly, whilst ye became companions of them that were so used.
korean_text: 혹은 비방과 환난으로써 사람에게 구경거리가 되고 혹은 이런 형편에 있는 자들과 사귀는 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: Partly, whilst ye were made a gazingstock
and partly, whilst ye became companions
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 부분적으로는 여러분이 동반자들이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: of them that were so used
